response.original_title: Enigmas of the World: The Ghost of Amelia Fox
response.overview: Do you see dead people? You just might after watching this fascinating documentary, which prowls around a haunted house on the island of Rhodes, Greece, in search of the ghost of one Amelia Fox. But what the filmmakers uncover is more than a restless spirit; they reveal a tragic love affair that ended in a woman's untimely death. Capturing spine-tingling sounds and unexplainable images, it's a ghost hunt you won't soon forget.
response.title: Enigmas of the World: The Ghost of Amelia Fox
